DOC.brief_summary: The relevant predictive hospital risk factor 5-year mortality patient aortic dissection untill unlear . The aim study collect clinical data 111 hospitalized patient admit hospital Aug. 2001 Aug. 2007 , statistically analyze hospital risk factor relate 5-year mortality univariate multivariate binary logistic regression .
DOC.brief_title: Logistic Regression Risk Factor 5-year Mortality Aortic Dissection
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical data collect 111 hospitalized patient admit hospital Aug. 2001 Aug.2007 , related factor death within 5 year onset dissection , include Gender , age , history smoking , hypertension , diabetes , renal insufficiency ( azotemia ) , low admission diastolic blood pressure ( < 70mmHg ) , Stanford typing ( Stanford A B ) , long-acting calcium channel blocker treatment , ACEI /ARB treatment , endovascular stent surgical aortic replacement , statistically analyzed univariate multivariate binary logistic regression .
DOC.criteria: Stanford type A dissection Stanford type B dissection
